page.title: 20STANION SCHOOL
page.content:
Stanion school is a small Church of England controlled school with approx. seventy pupils. The present building was opened in 1969 although the school itself dates back to the 1850's. It has three classes with three full-time teachers including the head teacher and a part-time teacher for two days a week. They are:
Mr Walton-Head Mrs Drage -cleaner Mrs Hunter Mrs Claypole-cook Mrs Fisher Mrs Carson-assistant Mrs Blakeley(part-time) cook Mrs Higginson- Mrs Skinner- )dinner secretary/ancillary Mrs McKenna)ladies
Up to Easter ancillary hours were 30 but have recently been reduced.So the head has to undertake secretarial duties as well.
